text: Neu chung pha vo loi the sau hiep uoc cua chung va phi bang ton giao cua cac nguoi (hoi nhung nguoi co đuc tin) thi cac nguoi hay đanh nhung ten đau đang vo đuc tin. That vay, chang co loi the nao (thieng lieng) đoi voi chung ca, (chi co chinh chien voi chung) thi chung moi co the dung lai (hanh đong quay nhieu cua chung)
